On Wed, 10 Sep 2008, David Saff <david@...> wrote:

> This is really late, but might help people searching the archives.
> I believe that ant did not fully support JUnit 4 until version 1.7.

Right, prior to 1.7.0 you'd need to help Ant by providing suite()
methods in all your JUnit4 style tests

<http://stefan.samaflost.de/blog/en/Apache/Ant/junit4_and_ant.html>
<http://stefan.samaflost.de/blog/en/Apache/Ant/junit4_and_ant_no_problem.html>

and even Ant 1.5 should work.

Note that any version of Ant will not report anything on ignored tests
and that Ant still makes a difference between errors and failures.

Stefan
